00060 template<typename T, typename Alloc = thrust::device_allocator<T> >
00061   class device_vector
00062     : public detail::vector_base<T,Alloc>
00063 {
00064   private:
00065     typedef detail::vector_base<T,Alloc> Parent;
00066 
00067   public:
00068     // typedefs
00069     typedef typename Parent::size_type  size_type;
00070     typedef typename Parent::value_type value_type;
00071 
00074     __host__
00075     device_vector(void)
00076       :Parent() {}
00077 
00083     __host__
00084     explicit device_vector(size_type n, const value_type &value = value_type())
00085       :Parent(n,value) {}
00086 
00090     __host__
00091     device_vector(const device_vector &v)
00092       :Parent(v) {}
00093 
00097     template<typename OtherT, typename OtherAlloc>
00098     __device__
00099     device_vector(const device_vector<OtherT,OtherAlloc> &v)
00100       :Parent(v) {}
00101 
00105     template<typename OtherT, typename OtherAlloc>
00106     __device__
00107     device_vector &operator=(const device_vector<OtherT,OtherAlloc> &v)
00108     { Parent::operator=(v); return *this; }
00109 
00113     template<typename OtherT, typename OtherAlloc>
00114     __host__
00115     device_vector(const std::vector<OtherT,OtherAlloc> &v)
00116       :Parent(v) {}
00117 
00121     template<typename OtherT, typename OtherAlloc>
00122     __host__
00123     device_vector &operator=(const std::vector<OtherT,OtherAlloc> &v)
00124     { Parent::operator=(v); return *this;}
00125 
00129     template<typename OtherT, typename OtherAlloc>
00130     __host__
00131     device_vector(const host_vector<OtherT,OtherAlloc> &v);
00132 
00137     template<typename InputIterator>
00138     __host__
00139     device_vector(InputIterator begin, InputIterator end)
00140       :Parent(begin,end) {}
00141 }; // end device_vector
